title: $:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button
name: Button
author: dyp
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/CSS":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/CSS","caption":"CSS注释","condition":"[<targetTiddler>type[]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]prefix[text/]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/javascript]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/json]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[image/svg+xml]] +[first[]]","created":"20240313040827751","description":"添加一个CSS注释","modified":"20250527121011246","shortcuts":"((CSS))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 代码注释","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="font-size: 0.6em;">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="wrap-selection"
	prefix={{{[[/* ]] }}}
	suffix={{{[[ */]] }}}
/>
<$text text="/*  */"/>
</$button>"},"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/HTML":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/HTML","caption":"HTML注释","condition":"[<targetTiddler>type[]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]prefix[text/]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/javascript]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/json]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[image/svg+xml]] +[first[]]","created":"20240313041604280","description":"添加一个HTML注释","modified":"20250527114953334","shortcuts":"((HTML))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 代码注释","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="font-size: 0.6em;">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="wrap-selection"
	prefix={{{[[<!-- ]] }}}
	suffix={{{[[ -->]] }}}
/>
<$text text="<!--  -->"/>
</$button>"},"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/JavaScript":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/JavaScript","caption":"JavaScript注释","condition":"[<targetTiddler>type[]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]prefix[text/]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/javascript]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/json]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[image/svg+xml]] +[first[]]","created":"20250527114152646","description":"添加一个JavaScript注释","modified":"20250527114545581","shortcuts":"((JavaScript))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 代码注释","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="font-size: 0.6em;">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="wrap-selection"
	prefix={{{[[// ]] }}}
	suffix={{{[[]] }}}
/>
<$text text="//"/>
</$button>"},"$:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button/history","created":"20250527124029952","modified":"20250527124224830","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; v.0.0.2 2025-05-27

# 新增JavaScript代码注释符号 `// `；
# 字段condition内容：

```tw
[<targetTiddler>type[]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]prefix[text/]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/javascript]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/json]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]match[image/svg+xml]] +[first[]]
```
"},"$:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button/readme","created":"20250428175617478","modified":"20250428180307729","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 3个快捷输入代码注释符号的小按钮

```tw
/*  */
<!--  -->
// 
```
"}}}
